Title: Extends provisions of law relating to the New York telecommunications relay service center
Summary: Extends provisions of law relating to the New York telecommunications relay service center from June 30, 2027 until June 30, 2030.
LawCode: Amd Part H1 ยง4, Chap 62 of 2003
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 62 of the laws of 2003, amending the public service law relating to establishing the New York telecommunications relay service center, in relation to extending certain provisions of such center
